title: Alibaba IPO: Market values e-commerce giant at $231bn in enthusiastic opening day âÂ live | Business | The Guardian
summary: graphic : how much is jack ma worth ?
alibaba trading opens at $ 92.70 per share .
'no firm eta ' on first alibaba trades .
signs of potential big leap when alibaba first trades .

text: we 're going to wrap up our live blog coverage of the alibaba ipo .
here 's a summary of where things stand : alibaba stock closed the day up 38 % to land at a market valuation of $ 231bn on its first day of trading on the new york stock exchange .
that 's currently 11th biggest in the united states , right behind chevron and right ahead of jp morgan chase .
jack ma , the founder and ceo of alibaba , was confirmed as the richest person ( on paper ) in china , with an estimated net worth of $ 18.01bn .
ma and colleagues were all smiles on the exchange floor .
it was the biggest initial public offering in us stock market history .
the ipo raised $ 21.8bn .
in 2012 , facebook raised $ 16bn .
initial trading was delayed for hours past the opening bell , but volume was high and the price held steady for much of the day after an early spike past $ 99 .
analysts saw the ipo as having run smoothly .
the question now , one told the guardian , is what they are going to use the money for .
here 's a chart of the first-day action for alibaba stock on the nyse , via google finance .
volume was 271,193,821 .
market cap is $ 231.44bn .
a chart of alibaba stock on 19 september 2014 .
dominic rushe has been speaking to rapid ratings ceo james gellert .
gellert has been impressed by the ipo which , despite the delay , has run very smoothly .
now he wants to know what happens next : they have n't really said what they are going to use the money for , he said .
what it has done is put china firmly on the map as a tech power .
this puts the us on notice that global tech is about more than silicon valley , he says .

documents.title: alibaba closes day up 38 %
text: the stock closes at $ 93.89 , up exactly 38.07 % from the $ 68 ipo and up a sliver more than 1 % from the first trade $ 92.70 .
about four minutes till the closing bell .
the stock is hovering at $ 93.50 .
volume is well above 260m .
marketwatch ranks alibaba by size based on its introductory price of $ 92.70 a share ( about 15 minutes before the close , the stock is at $ 92.86 ) .
anora mahmudova ( @ anorajourno ) if $ baba was in s & p500 , at $ 92.70 a share it would be # 12 company by market cap , via @ twitterid
the stock is trucking along at about $ 1.50 a share below its first trade , around $ 91.20 .
have you visited alibaba.com ?
check it out .
alfred m maskeroni ( @ digimatized ) alibaba homepage

the alibaba offering created a wave of thousands of chinese nouveau riche , usa today reports : with friday 's eye-popping , record-breaking $ 167 billion listing in new york , china 's nouveau riche just swelled some more as more than 5,000 current and former alibaba employees were selling their shares in this ipo .
and they wo n't lack for places to splurge their new-found wealth .
neighbors , congratulations screamed a real estate billboard friday at the xixifengqing development a single street away from alibaba 's headquarters in east china 's hangzhou city .
this group of potential buyers is rich enough to buy the bigger townhouse , which is around $ 1.3 million for a 3,230 square foot house , salesman wang mengzhou said .
i 'm confident our sales will soar in the near future .
read the full piece here .
these people are not in line for an iphone .
ben eisen ( @ beneisen ) there was quite a crowd outside the nyse after alibaba shares debuted $ baba

alibaba stunned investors on friday by becoming the 18th-biggest company in the world by valuation , ahead of facebook , amazon and ebay , writes the guardian 's rupert neate ( @ rupertneate ) : shares in the firm , founded by a chinese english teacher-turned businessman , soared to $ 92.70 as trading began a 36 % premium above the offer price on the new york stock exchange .
at one point the shares came within a whisker of $ 100 before falling back .
the share price surge valued the company at $ 230bn ( â£ 141bn ) more than amazon and ebay combined , and more than jp morgan , the biggest bank in the us .
it was one of the world 's three biggest-ever flotations , and a record on wall street .
read the full piece here .
the rumour this week spread like wildfire : could it be possible that jack ma , one of china 's greatest success stories , was planning to leave the mainland for good ?

the guardian 's jonathan kaiman in beijing profiles ma : on tuesday , hong kong 's economic journal claimed that alibaba founder ma , planned to move to hong kong next year on an investment immigration scheme .
immediately , the news went viral on chinese social media sites .

recent statistics show 47 % of chinese millionaires plan to leave , mainly to escape economic uncertainty and environmental decay , but ma departing would be an extraordinary blow to china 's self-image as an emerging global player he is its greatest rags-to-riches hero , an inspiration to a generation of budding entrepreneurs .
earlier this week , ma quickly put the rumour to rest .

speaking to reporters in hong kong , he appeared physically precarious ma is razor-thin and stands about five feet tall yet animated and forceful , with bulging forehead and expressive , restless hands .
his speech was both patriotic and diplomatic , colloquial yet clearly well-planned .
he explained that he had no plans to emigrate .
hangzhou is where i was born , went to school and started my business , he said , speaking of his coastal chinese hometown .
read the full piece here .

the guardian 's dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) has filed a story on this morning 's alibaba offer : the biggest ever share sale in the us got off to a flying if delayed start on friday as shares in alibaba , the chinese internet giant , started trading in the new york stock exchange at $ 92.70 much higher than their initial $ 68 price .
the sale of china 's biggest online retailer has triggered a frenzy among investors clamouring to buy into the the world 's fastest growing market and a new tech titan .
shares soared to $ 95 in early trading before drifting down to around $ 90 , 32 % above the start price and instantly making the company one of the most valuable in the world .
founded by jack ma , a former english teacher who started the site from his one-bedroom apartment in hangzhou in 1998 , alibaba now controls 80 % of online commerce in china .
read the full piece here .
if you 're following the alibaba ipo today , there 's another rollout you may be interested in : jeff elder ( @ jeffelder ) at # sf # apple store , norton the golden doodle is a cuddly tradition .
he 's waited in line for every # iphone since 1 .
an early afternoon dip sent the stock below $ 90 a share , but it is currently trading at around $ 92 .
cnbc ( @ cnbc ) breaking : alibaba briefly breaks below $ 90 a share .

for a corrective view to today 's stock frenzy , read the wall street journal 's paul vigna 's three reasons to avoid alibaba stock and one reason not to worry : that 's a reason not to worry about your investment .
that said , there are other aspects of alibaba and this ipo that should have investors on guard .
corporate governance .
this might be the biggest red flag for your average investor .
it can not possibly bolster investor confidence that alibaba 's ownership structure was labeled worst in class by msci .

the problem is that the way the company is set up , a small sliver of shareholders , which included founder jack ma , will have control of the company , no matter that they own only about 13 % of the shares outstanding , and no matter whether or not they sell their stakes in the future .
vigna also gets into the health of the chinese economy and share pricing .
read the full thing here .

alibaba group holding ltd founder jack ma ( c ) rings a ceremonial bell to start trading during his company 's initial public offering ( ipo ) under the ticker baba at the new york stock exchange in new york september 19 , 2014 .
mcdermid/reuters
here 's the alibaba stock price chart so far today , via google finance : alibaba trading began at 11.53am .
shares reached nearly $ 100 before quickly settling .
alibaba 's sale does n't seem to be helping yahoo today , dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) notes : yahoo is alibaba 's largest shareholder and sold $ 5.1.bn worth of shares today .
yahoo still owns 401.8m additional baba shares , valued around $ 37bn based on alibaba 's $ 92.70 opening price .
but that 's not helping .
the company 's shares have fallen more than 4 % since trading began .
alibaba 's trading volume is huge but not quite as fast-paced as the facebook trading was , the wall street journal notes .
on the day of its ipo , facebook traded 216m shares in the first half hour and hit almost 574m in its first full day of trading .
since trading began at 11.53am , alibaba has traded more than 152m shares .
alibaba volume so far in the first 20 minutes or so is huge , having surpassed 133m shares .
the average daily trade volume of yahoo stock is 27.8m shares/day .
cnbc tech ( @ cnbctech ) a look at what it felt like the moment alibaba opened for trading .
$ baba
how big is alibaba ?

at the daily high so far of close to $ 100 per share , the company would be among the top 10 biggest us companies , the wall street journal reports : at $ 99.70 , alibaba had a $ 245.7 billion market capitalization , placing it among the top 10 biggest u.s. companies .
if alibaba were in the s & p 500 it would rank as ninth biggest , just ahead of wal-mart , chevron and p & g , according to s & p capital iq .
alibaba shares have now settled back to their initial trading price and a bit below , trading as low as $ 92.09 .
darth¢ ( @ darth ) going to buy a share of $ baba as soon as hit reaches $ 68 again

documents.title: graphic : how much is jack ma worth ?
text: tracking the wealth of china 's newly minted richest man : guardian interactive : how much is jack ma worth ?
a lot of excitement on the floor , which you can surveil via livestream here .
jordan s. terry ( @ the analyst ) nyse floor has n't been this active since the late 80s nyse ( @ nyse ) $ baba is # open on the # nyse at $ 92.70 .
congratulations to @ twitterid on today 's # nyseipo !
dominic rushe blinks twice : alibaba shares jump to $ 98 , giving the stock a $ 241 billion market cap and sitting less than $ 5 billion away from wal-mart 's market value .
the initial trading price of alibaba values the company at close to $ 230bn and puts jack ma 's personal stake at somewhere north of $ 20bn .
update : see our graphic , how much is jack ma worth , here .
jessica guynn ( @ jguynn ) $ baba market cap is just under $ 229 billion .
bigger than facebook , amazon , intel , ibm .
the list goes on .

documents.title: alibaba trading opens at $ 92.70 per share
text: trading begins at $ 92.70 .
you can follow the share price near $ 96 now at google finance here .
as our live blog coverage continues , here 's a summary of where things stand : trading of alibaba shares had yet to begin as the chinese e-commerce giant made its initial public offering .
update : the stock began trading moments later at $ 92.70 per share .

the delay in trading was said to stem from a likely large volume of small orders from retail investors to be sorted through , and a determination of market makers not to repeat the nasdaq facebook ipo fiasco of 2012 .
the stock appeared set to begin trading at a price significantly higher than the $ 68 per share it was offered at .
estimates of the opening trading price are now around $ 92 ( and still climbing ) .
it is set to be the biggest ipo in stock market history and to make alibaba founder and ceo jack ma the richest person in china .
earlier dominic rushe wrote about how yahoo is one of today 's biggest winners , as alibaba 's biggest us shareholder .

yahoo volume today is huge : cnbc newsroom ( @ cnbcnow ) yahoo has traded nearly 3x its normal daily volume before $ baba has begun trading ; $ yhoo already traded 76m shares vs. 27.8m entire day avg .
dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) has been speaking to sam hamadeh , founder of the analyst privco .

people had been expecting alibaba to start trading at 10:30 and the delay is making everyone nervous : it 's unusual for there to be a delay this long , but this is an unusual ipo because it so large , he says .
hamadeh thinks there are probably a large number of small orders for shares from retail investors that the are now being sorted and which are probably slowing things down .
they clearly want to get this right .
they do n't want another facebook .
but they have to get this going eventually , even facebook started trading at 11:40 .
joseph weisenthal ( @ thestalwart ) any moment now

documents.title: 'no firm eta ' on first alibaba trades
text: no firm eta on first trades , cnbc reports .
the wall street journal has this analysis : could the delay be potentially linked to the concentration of the book ?
we 've reportedthat 25 accounts got 50 % , top 40 accounts got nearly 80 % , and that retail only got a sliver .
usually ipo bankers like to give at least some of the stock to flippers like fast-money hedgies and quick-buck retail folks .
possibly they did n't give out enough here .
the nyse explains what 's happening behind the scenes in advance of the first alibaba trades : nyse ( @ nyse ) # alibaba update : price range shifts to $ 87- $ 89 .
# nyseipo price discovery process continues .
after last night , this joke speaks to us .
( the full results of the scottish referendum , with maps and percentages and bar graphs , are here . )
steve goldstein ( @ mktwgoldstein ) the next # indyref will ask if scotland wants to sell the place to jack ma

it 's an old-fashioned good time today on the new york stock exchange , where humans appear temporarily to have thrown off the rule of the machines : ben white ( @ morningmoneyben ) nice to see humans getting excited on the nyse floor .
it 's like a throwback to the 1990s .
$ baba
post 8 .
ma 's lucky number ?
cnbc ( @ cnbc ) ma is now visiting post 8 where $ baba will trade .
barclays is the dmm at this post .
updates : to capture the full luck of the 8 , alibaba initially had thought to roll out on august 8 , bloomberg reported .
there 's speculation that the 8-session could go even further : michael gray ( @ 12mgray ) # baba will open at $ 88 for good luck .
# nyp

still waiting for the shares to start trading , writes the guardian 's dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) : the speculation is that they could start selling at $ 82 to $ 85 per share - 20.5 % and 25 % above the $ 68 initial price .
it 's not unusual in large ipos how have a delay like this , but alibaba will be hoping to avoid the fiasco that befell facebook 's share sale in 2012 .
facebook listed on the nasdaq stock exchange and its systems failed to keep up with the massive interest in what was - until today - the largest tech ipo in history .
delays ensued , orders were messed up and lawsuits followed .
the color of money : today it 's orange .
david faber ( @ davidfaber ) awaiting open of what is now the largest ipo of all time .
$ baba

documents.title: signs of potential big leap when alibaba first trades
text: arjun kharpal ( @ arjunkharpal ) indicated opening range for alibaba shares nudges up a little to between $ 82 and $ 85 # alibabaipo $ baba the wall street journal adds context : at the high end of the range , it 's still just below the average one-day pop for u.s. listed tech or internet ipos this year , which is 26 % , according to dealogic .
yahoo is one of today 's biggest winners , writes the guardian 's dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) .

the us tech firm is alibaba 's biggest us shareholder and stands to receive $ 5.1bn after selling 121.7m of its shares in the e-commerce giant and paying a capital-gains tax of about 38 % : yahoo will return at least half of the alibaba proceeds to shareholders , finance chief ken goldman said in july .
but the company has been very acquisitive under ceo marrissa mayer and all that money has already sparked speculation about a big deal .
yesterday shares in aol spiked after an analyst note suggested it might be a takeover target ( it has fallen again today ) .
two years into her tenure mayer is under pressure to turn around the still struggling business , which is continuing to lose market share to google and facebook .
is this her chance to buy her way out of trouble ?
this number is higher than $ 68 .
at least 18 % higher .
cnbc ( @ cnbc ) barclays designated market maker to cnbc : `` we 've got first indication at $ 80-83 '' .
¢ $ baba

most orders filled for alibaba shares as part of today 's offering went to us investors , the wall street journal reports but half of the people who put in orders reportedly got no stock : over 1,700 investors world-wide put in orders for alibaba shares , according to people familiar with the matter .
about half of them got no stock , the people said .
a majority of the shares were sold to u.s. investors , they said .
meanwhile , 25 investment firms were sold about half of the stock in the ipo , people familiar with the deal said .
that 's unusually concentrated for a deal of this size , said a banker familiar with the process .

around 7:30 a.m. new york time friday , bankers started confirming allocations with investors , a necessary step before the shares can open on the new york stock exchange , people familiar with the process said .
in the cnbc interview , ma said one of his heroes is forrest gump , the character played by tom hanks in the 1994 best picture winner .
whenever i get frustrated i watch that movie , ma said .
cnbc newsroom ( @ cnbcnow ) why alibaba 's jack ma loves forrest gump : ( via @ twitterid )

documents.title: high volume in alibaba rollout
text: volume : robust .
cnbc ( @ cnbc ) `` right now in the system , we literally have hundreds of thousands of orders '' , @ twitterid 's head of global listings tells @ twitterid .
$ baba
jack ma is speaking with cnbc on the floor of the nyse watch it here .

arjun kharpal ( @ arjunkharpal ) alibaba 's ma : i hope in 15 years we are compared to microsoft # alibabaipo $ baba arjun kharpal ( @ arjunkharpal ) alibaba 's ma : we have a dream we hope in the next 15 years the world changes because of us .
we want to be bigger than walmart $ baba robert frank ( @ robtfrank ) jack ma tells @ twitterid `` i asked my wife do you want me to be a rich man or respected businessman ? ''
answer : respected businessman
alibaba comes bearing gifts : nyse ( @ nyse ) thank you , # alibaba : the tao doll is a sign of respect and will be permanently displayed @ twitterid
here 's what it looked like as the bell rang : the dais is packed for the opening bell of the new york stock exchange , 19 september , 2014 , as alibaba group shares go on sale .
there it goes !
lots of applause .
you can follow the stock price here .
the stock does not trade immediately .
the wait is on , as the wall street journal puts it .
alibaba group holding ltd founder jack ma ( 2nd r ) arrives at the new york stock exchange for his company 's initial public offering ( ipo ) under the ticker baba in new york september 19 , 2014 .
mcdermid/reuters

some controversy attends this morning 's float , dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) reports , particularly with early investors avoiding the lockup that usually keeps them selling off shares in big flotations : while ma himself is set to sell 12.7m shares worth $ 867m at $ 68 a share other investors not identified by name in alibaba 's filings hold $ 8bn of shares that could also be sold at the ipo , which is expected to raise $ 22bn .
the number of shares represents about a third of what could be sold in the deal and is highly unusual .
when facebook the last record breaking tech ipo -went public in 2012 investors were not allowed to sell pre-ipo shares .

the guardian 's dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) reports on how a former university lecturer is poised this morning to be confirmed as china 's richest man : jack ma , 50 , still owns 9 % of the online commerce giant he began 15 years ago , which announced it would sell shares at $ 68 last night , valuing the company at $ 16.6bn bigger than amazon and more than double the value of ebay .

alibaba controls nearly 80 percent of all e-commerce in china , although ma , known for stunts such as dressing as lady gaga , already hinted last week at ambitions that go beyond the country 's borders .

speaking for alibaba , we hope to become a global company , so after we go public in the us , we will expand strongly in europe and america , he told reporters in hong kong during his global tour to meet investors .
at the same time we wo n't abandon asia , because after all we 're not a company from china , we are an internet company that happens to be in china .
people are pumped up for this one .
ben eisen ( @ beneisen ) trader on the nyse floor saying this is nothing like he 's ever seen before in terms of excitement .
tremendous demand for the stock , he says
ca n't make it down to the floor of the nyse to watch the opening bell ring ?
watch it here !

documents.title: big day on wall street
text: good morning and welcome to our live blog coverage of what is likely to be the largest initial public offering of all time , as shares of alibaba , the chinese e-commerce juggernaut , are offered on the new york stock exchange .
alibaba set the price of its shares ( nyse : baba ) on thursday at $ 68 , the top end of its planned range , and the company is expected to raise up to $ 22bn ( â£ 13.5bn ) .
at $ 68 a share , the company is valued at $ 167.6bn bigger than amazon and more than double the value of ebay .
the stock sale includes $ 8bn in shares from early investors , who usually would be locked out of immediate trading .

today 's rollout is so big that the stock exchange ran test runs of its systems over the summer , hoping to avoid the mess of the may 2012 facebook rollout , when nasdaq 's system failed to keep up with demand .
the guardian 's dominic rushe ( @ dominicru ) is covering today 's ipo .
here 's further reading as we wait for the market to open : alibaba and the 40 facts .
